creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: head band has eleven attached squares on lower edge, connected by multicolored wrapped metal medallions and beads, and magenta and gold yarn fringes; headband and squares are embroidered in geometric cross stitch--red, cream, black and white; borders of band are scalloped applied tape in red and green; ends of wrap have applied tape in greens and red floral embroidery; two ties; blue and white cotton lining
dimension:
34 1/2 x 5 1/2 in. (87.63 x 13.97 cm) (including tassels)
5 in. (12.7 cm) (object part, tie)
10 1/4 in. (26.04 cm) (object part, tie)
medium: Cotton, silk, glass and plastic beads, metal medallions
title: Head Wrap
